common.eufyCurrentState: Guard modus of the eufy system
common.eufyLastConnectionResult: Result of last communication with eufy
common.eufyLastConnectionTime: Timestamp of last communication with eufy
common.eufyLastStatusUpdateTime: Timestamp of last update of the eufy systemstate
common.eufyLastModeChangeTime: Timestamp of the last mode change

station.eufyLastModeChangeTime: Timestamp of the last mode change for station {{stationSerial}}
station.eufyCentralCurrentModeChangeTime: Timestamp of the last current mode change for station {{stationSerial}}

device.eufyCameraVideoTime: Timestamp of the still image for camera {{deviceSerial}}
